property.name: Question
property.value: You may ask one MOTIVE question or one RESULT question.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: Mulder: "How'd you hear about us?"Det. Sharon Lazard: "My brother's a cop. Baltimore. He told me about your work on the Tooms case, said you gotta good feel for things out of the ordinary."

property.name: Text
property.value: Play this card on a Team with Dana Scully to search through your Bureau Deck and add one of the following cards to your hand: "Margaret Scully", "Queequeg", "Melissa Scully", "Tara Scully", or "Father McCue". If you play the chosen card immediately, then you may do so for half cost (rounded up).

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: Dana Scully: "Look at you, my big brother."Bill Scully, Jr.: "Sorry, I'm late. My ship got stuck in traffic."

property.name: Text
property.value: Play this card when your opponent either uses a token or plays a card to negate your GOVERNMENT Adversary or Event. Discard one Witness card from your hand to negate the effect.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "No. No. No, sir. I won't be a patsy." - Lee Harvey Oswald

property.name: Question
property.value: You may ask one AFFILIATION question.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: Skinner: "What do you got?"Scully: "Roche's old address in the area. Revere. 9809 Alice Road, apartment number six."Mulder: "He's there."

property.name: Text
property.value: Negate one EVOLUTIONARY Adversary. In addition, if the Team makes a CRIMINAL INVESTIGATION skill check 6+, they may ask either one MOTIVE or one METHOD question.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: Eddie Van Blundht: "I just think it's funny. I was born a loser, but you're one by choice."Mulder: "On what do you base that astute assessment?"Van Blundht: "Experience. You should live a little. Treat yourself. God knows I would if I were you."

property.name: Game Effect
property.value: Place three tokens on this card. Discard a token to examine any one Bluff card. Place Bluff card back on Site after examining.

property.name: Bio
property.value: Despite many strange cases, Dana Scully is resolute in her belief that science will lead her and Mulder to find the truth. When an inoperable cancer diagnosis forces her to overcome an existential crisis, Scully's allies endeavor to save her life at all costs.

property.name: Game Effect
property.value: Place three tokens on this card. Discard a token to examine any one Bluff card. Place Bluff card back on Site after examining.

property.name: Bio
property.value: Despite many strange cases, Dana Scully is resolute in her belief that science will lead her and Mulder to find the truth. When an inoperable cancer diagnosis forces her to overcome an existential crisis, Scully's allies endeavor to save her life at all costs.

property.name: Game Effect
property.value: [RP]s generated by Agent Mulder must be used to purchase cards. Place three tokens on this card. Discard a token to play a Site for zero [RP] cost.

property.name: Bio
property.value: A highly skilled yet unconventional FBI Agent, Fox Mulder specializes in paranormal investigation. As a crisis of doubt threatens his belief in alien phenomena, Mulder begins to suspect that the man who raised him may not be his biological father.

property.name: Game Effect
property.value: [RP]s generated by Agent Mulder must be used to purchase cards. Place three tokens on this card. Discard a token to play a Site for zero [RP] cost.

property.name: Bio
property.value: A highly skilled yet unconventional FBI Agent, Fox Mulder specializes in paranormal investigation. As a crisis of doubt threatens his belief in alien phenomena, Mulder begins to suspect that the man who raised him may not be his biological father.

property.name: Game Effect
property.value: Agent Hedin has access to the Field Office Crime Lab. Place one token on this card. Remove a token to draw one Keyword EVIDENCE or EVIDENCE COLLECTION card from your Bureau Deck and add it to your hand. Shuffle your deck.

property.name: Bio
property.value: Agent Hedin was assigned to the FBI Sci - Crime Lab in Washington, D.C. She matched fingerprints found in the American University stairwell to those of Pentagon employee Michael Kritschgau following his assault on Agent Scully.

property.name: Game Effect
property.value: Place one token on this card. Discard a token to negate one Bluff. Additionally, if Agent Doggett is on the same Team as Agent Scully, change her Keyword SKEPTIC to BELIEVER.

property.name: Bio
property.value: Prior to joining the FBI, John Doggett served in both the U.S. Marines and the NYPD. Assigned to the X - Files in the wake of Agent Mulder's disappearance, Doggett's no - nonsense rationalism often put him at odds with Agent Scully.

property.name: Game Effect
property.value: If Agent Kautz is in the Bureau, he may contribute to any EVIDENCE COLLECTION skill check that is occurring in another section of the table.

property.name: Bio
property.value: As part of the FBI's Firearms Unit, Agent Kautz analyzed the ballistics of Agent Mulder's service weapon to prove he didn't murder his father ("Anasazi"). Kautz later ascertained the gun used to murder Detective Ray Thomas but indicated the serial number had been removed, rendering the weapon untraceable ("Zero Sum").

property.name: Text
property.value: Attach this card to one of your Agents to apply a -1 modifier to the Agent's HEALTH. While this Agent is in the Field, your opponent must randomly reveal one card in their hand, once per turn. When this Resource is discarded, the Agent's HEALTH is restored.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "Whatever's happening to me, whatever treatment I've received, is allowing me to go back into my unconscious. The truth is in there, recorded, and I've gotten access to it." - Mulder

property.name: Text
property.value: Play on a Team during the Deployment Phase. If the Team makes an ALIEN INVESTIGATION 5+ skill check, they may investigate two Sites in either the same state or neighboring states this turn.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "Someone used Krycek, then Krycek used us. Someone who didn't want that rock in American hands." - Mulder

property.name: Text
property.value: Play on an Agent in the Hospital. The Agent heals up to three tokens of damage and any afflicting Keywords (i.e. CANCER, INSANITY) are removed.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: Alien Bounty Hunter: "I need to know the reasons why this should be."The Cigarette - Smoking Man: "So that the work may continue. So that the project may proceed unabated by removing an unnecessary obstacle."

property.name: Text
property.value: Play on any Adversary to add 1 to its CLOSE RANGE COMBAT skill check. In addition, if the Adversary is ALIEN, play on the chosen Agent in Combat to negate their combat skills this round.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: Alien Bounty Hunter: "Where are they going?"Scully (gasping for air): "Uh...I don't know."Alien Bounty Hunter: "I need to know."

property.name: Text
property.value: Adds 1 to one Team's BUREAUCRACY or OBSERVATION skill check.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: Angie Pintero: "You think Harold killed those women?"Mulder: "You obviously don't think so, huh?"Pintero: "Harold's worked for me for 10 years. He might be crazy but he couldn't kill anyone. He's a sweet kid."

property.name: Question
property.value: You may ask one AFFILIATION question.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: Scully: "This is where you saw the body?"Angie Pintero: "Yes ma'am. She was caught up in the machinery. Her neck was cut."

property.name: Text
property.value: Adds 1 to the Agent's RES value. This card may be attached at zero cost if played after one of your Agents has been removed from the game. Each player may only have one of this card in their decks.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "I just thought it was a pretty cool keychain." - Mulder

property.name: Text
property.value: Adds 1 to one Team's OCCULT INVESTIGATION skill check once per turn. Alternately, you may discard this card to negate the Adversary "The Golem Exacts Revenge".

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "I am to my beloved...as my beloved is to me." - Ariel Weiss, in Hebrew

property.name: Text
property.value: Attach this card to a Witness RESOURCE. While in play, this card enables your Agents to attack OCCULT CREATURES otherwise unaffected by Combat attacks. This card remains in play until the attached Witness is discarded or removed from the game.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "It's a communal wedding ring made in Colon, a village near Prague. My father was an apprentice to the man who designed it." - Ariel Weiss

property.name: Text
property.value: If the Team makes a SCIENCES 4+ skill check, add five tokens to the [RP] Pool.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "You know, with this equipment I have been able to capture phantom images of whole leaves that were cut in half or the vestigial image of a lizard's tail long after it's been cut off - which, you have to admit is pretty cool." - Dr. Charles Burks

property.name: Question
property.value: You may ask one AFFILIATION question or one METHOD question.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: Mulder: "What is it?"Jeremiah Smith: "A flowering shrub. But its specific epithet can't be found on any of your taxonomic charts."

property.name: Question
property.value: You may ask one RESULT question.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: Scully: "His name was Isaac Luria. He lived in the Williamsburg section of Brooklyn, home to a sect of Hasidic Jews who have lived there since the late 19th Century."Mulder: "It's an area also known for its history of racial tensions and hate crimes. Rosenbaum, Tawana Brawley."

property.name: Text
property.value: Agents equipped with a Biohazard Suit have access to the Field Office Crime Lab. Adds 2 to the Agent's SCIENCES skill.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: Pendrell: "These are Level 4 suits. Exactly what he's wearing."Scully: "Contamination is impossible unless there's a tear or a loss of pressurization. So whatever happened to him, it's unlikely it penetrated the suit."

property.name: Text
property.value: Place in your Field section with two tokens on this card. Remove a token to double the [CP] cost of any one Bluff played by your opponent. If your opponent is unable to pay the augmented cost, the Bluff is discarded. Discard this resource after both tokens are removed.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "Life...is like a box of chocolates. A cheap, thoughtless, perfunctory gift that nobody ever asks for. Unreturnable, because all you get back is another box of chocolates." - The Cigarette - Smoking Man

property.name: Text
property.value: Play on any PRIMORDIAL Adversary to allow it to deal all of its damage in the round before its opponents. Any opponents sent to the Hospital as a result of this damage do not cause damage this round.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "Federal agent! I'm armed! Stop or I'll fire!" - Mulder

property.name: Text
property.value: Play on a Team of two or more Agents investigating a Keyword MONO Site to increase the Site Prerequisite to 5+. If the Team makes a BEHAVIORAL 4+ skill check, this card is negated. If they fail to make the Site skill check, one Agent (your choice) takes 3 points of damage and the increased Site Prerequisite remains in effect.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "Scully, watch your step. This place is rigged." - Mulder

property.name: Text
property.value: Play this card to add CANCER to an opposing Agent's Keywords. The Agent's HEALTH is reduced by 1 for each of your opponent's Debriefing Phases that the Agent doesn't spend in the Hospital. If the Agent's HEALTH is reduced to zero, they must remain in the Hospital until HEALTH is restored. This card is removed when a Healing card is played on the Agent.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "I have cancer. It is a mass on the wall between my sinus and cerebrum." - Scully

property.name: Text
property.value: Play this card to add CANCER to an opposing Agent's Keywords. The Agent's HEALTH is reduced by one for each of the opponent's Debriefing Phases that the Agent spends outside of the Hospital. If the Agent's HEALTH is reduced to zero, they must remain in the Hospital until HEALTH is restored. This card is removed when a Healing card is played on the Agent.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "Now what is cancer but normal cells growing rapidly out of control usually caused by some damage to their DNA." - Mulder

property.name: Text
property.value: Play on a Team in which one Agent has just been abducted or removed from the game. Search your Bureau Deck and draw one Keyword LAW Agent card and use it immediately at no cost. Reshuffle your Deck. Discard the Agent at the end of your turn.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: Commander Carver: "I'd be happy to have you work on our investigation. Now this is Detective Gwynn - "Mulder: "I'm working alone."Carver: "An FBI Agent without a partner?"

property.name: Question
property.value: You may ask one METHOD question or one RESULT question.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "If you've been here, Mulder I don't think it was any time recently. The place looks abandoned and completely overgrown." - Scully

property.name: Text
property.value: Play this card on an Agent in the Hospital. The Agent heals one token of damage immediately. This card heals up to two tokens of damage if the Agent has the Keyword CANCER.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "This is the evil of cancer, that it starts as an invader, but soon becomes one with the invaded, forcing you to destroy it but only at the risk of destroying yourself. It is science's demon possession; my treatment, science's attempted exorcism." - Scully

property.name: Text
property.value: Adds 1 to the Agent's ALIEN INVESTIGATION and EVIDENCE COLLECTION skills. While this card is in play any Keyword GOVERNMENT Adversary may ignore Activator requirements when attacking the Agent's Team.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "It's my sincere belief that what we have here is the complete corpus of an extraterrestrial biological entity." - Dr. Arlinsky

property.name: Text
property.value: Play this card any time after Dr. Charles Burks' game effect token has been removed. Place a new token on Burks' card. Remove this card from the game.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: Scully: "Are you ever asked to defend this as a legitimate scientific process, Dr. Burks?"Dr. Burks: "Only if you're not happy with the results."

property.name: Text
property.value: Play on any PRIMORDIAL or EVOLUTIONARY Adversary during a round of CLOSE RANGE COMBAT. The round will be fought between the Adversary and one Agent of your choice. No other combatants may participate in this CRC round. This card is free if the target Agent has the Keyword CANCER.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: Scully: "Mulder, get over here right now."Mulder: "What?"Scully: "Get over here right now."

property.name: Text
property.value: Place 2 tokens on this card. Remove a token to take any one Witness from your Discard Pile that modifies a skill check and use it immediately for zero cost. Discard this card when both tokens have been removed.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "He had two more victims." - Mulder, upon counting Roche's cloth hearts

property.name: Text
property.value: Adds 1 to the Agent's CRIMINAL INVESTIGATION and EVIDENCE COLLECTION skills.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "Dr. Yonechi was accompanied by a man in his seventies. It's a description confirmed by the desk clerk. They're working with a composite artist on a sketch right now." - Mulder

property.name: Text
property.value: Adds 2 to one Team's SUBTERFUGE or 1 to one Team's CRIMINAL INVESTIGATION skill check. If your opponent plays a PHENOMENA CREATURE Adversary while this card is in play, Lozano is negated and removed from the game.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "My mother used to say that blood should be left to cleanse itself. God curses the man who stands between two brothers." - Conrad Lozano

property.name: Text
property.value: Place three tokens on this card. Discard a token to add 2 to one Team's MEDICAL skill check. You may discard a token once per turn. Discard this Resource when all tokens have been removed.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "They say animals can develop an appetite for human flesh, but this is no animal. You see the teeth marks, just below the clavicle? They're human." - Coroner Glenna

property.name: Text
property.value: Prior to the Requisition Phase, play this card on a Team of two Agents. This Team may use the [CP] Pool to pay for Equipment and a Site in their respective phases. In addition, your opponent cannot play Bluffs on this Site nor attack the Team with GOVERNMENT Adversaries. Discard this card at the end of your turn.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "I can help you, Agent Mulder...With cover credentials. A diplomatic passport. A visa." - Marita Covarrubias

property.name: Text
property.value: Play this card on an Agent when they are in the Bureau with Agent Karen Kosseff. At the start of your next turn, you may discard this resource to either heal one token of damage or remove any one afflicted Keyword (i.e. CANCER, INSANITY) from the Agent.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "We've spoken about your fear. You've been afraid to express it to others, to Agent Mulder." - Agent Karen Kosseff

property.name: Text
property.value: Place three tokens on this card. Discard a token to add 2 to one Team's ALIEN INVESTIGATION skill check. You may discard a token once per turn. Discard this Resource when all tokens have been removed.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "You know, I've told this story so many times now - oh, to the newspapers and the police. And everytime I tell it, people get this, look in their eye, just like the look that you've got right now." - Darlene Morris to Scully

property.name: Text
property.value: Attach this card to any Agent with a MEDICAL skill of 1+ and place two tokens on the card. Remove a token to either heal one point of damage or to negate any one EVOLUTIONARY Adversary. Discard the Defibrillator when all tokens have been removed.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "They pronounced Betts ten minutes ago." - Mulder

property.name: Text
property.value: Attach this Witness to any one Keyword INDEPENDENT Agent. Adds 1 to the Agent's SUBTERFUGE skill once per turn. Discard this card when the Agent's HEALTH is reduced to zero.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "The Right Hand believes in empowering the individual over a corrupt and corrupting federal government. We're prepared for the time when armed resistance will be necessary." - Denny Markham

property.name: Text
property.value: Adds 2 to one Team's SCIENCES or adds 1 to one Team's ALIEN INVESTIGATION skill check. If your opponent plays an ALIEN Adversary while this card is in play, Murphy is negated and removed from the game.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: Denny Murphy: "...Professor of geology at U. C. San Diego."Mulder: "San Diego? You get much of a chance to study ice down there?"

property.name: Game Effect
property.value: Place one token on this card. Remove a token during the Requisition Phase to search your Bureau Deck for any one Keyword WEAPON or ARMOR Equipment card and attach it to Paster at half cost (rounded up). Reshuffle your Deck.

property.name: Bio
property.value: Barney Paster was the sole Deputy residing in the rural town of Home, Pennsylvania. Following the brutal murder of Sheriff Andy Taylor and Mrs. Taylor, Paster led Agents Mulder and Scully in an aggressive charge on the Peacock Family's farmhouse.

property.name: Text
property.value: Adds 1 to one Team's CRIMINAL INVESTIGATION or OCCULT INVESTIGATION skill check, or play this card to negate "Sheriff Daniels".

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "Sir? Gonna have to ask you to come with me. District Attorney wants to ask you some questions concerning the boy's death." - Deputy Tyson

property.name: Text
property.value: Play on an opposing Agent in the Bureau. The Agent may not leave the Bureau or add their skills to a skill check until a Team has successfully investigated a Site with Keywords CRIMINAL INVESTIGATION or OCCULT INVESTIGATION.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "Why don't I have a desk?" - Scully

property.name: Game Effect
property.value: During your Investigation Phase, add 1 [RP] to your pool if a Team including Detective Hudak is assigned to a Keyword MONO Site. The cost of any Witness card played at this Site is increased by 1 [RP].

property.name: Bio
property.value: Hudak is a hard - boiled Washington D.C. detective who investigated the murder of Penny Timmons. Unlike Agent Mulder, Hudak firmly believed that Harold Spuller was the prime suspect.

property.name: Text
property.value: Force your opponent to discard one Witness from their hand. If your opponent has no Witnesses in their hand, this card has no effect. If your opponent has a Witness to discard, attach Detective Curtis to one Investigating Agent (your choice). The Agent is arrested and removed from play until the remaining Agents make a CRIMINAL INVESTIGATION 4+ skill check.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: Scully: "You're jailing an innocent man."Detective Curtis: "Yeah, well, this way he won't get lost for two days and do something else he won't remember."

property.name: Game Effect
property.value: Place one token on this card. Remove a token when your opponent asks you a penalty question. You may respond with the following phrase: "Aluminum makes a lovely hat."

property.name: Bio
property.value: John Munch was a cynical detective for Baltimore Homicide unit in 1989 when he interrogated John Fitzgerald Byers about a mysterious shooting in a Fells Point warehouse and a delirious FBI Agent. Despite his belief in conspiracy theories, Munch was skeptical of Byers' story.

property.name: Text
property.value: Adds 1 to one Team's SCIENCES skill check once per turn. If your opponent plays a GOVERNMENT Adversary while this card is in play, Arlinsky is negated and removed from the game.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "He's a forensic anthropathologist that I've been in contact with over the last four years. Several years ago he was involved in an embarrassing UFO photo enhancement scandal. But he continues to profess his innocence." - Mulder

property.name: Text
property.value: If this Adversary is played on a Witness that contributes to a MEDICAL skill check, the Witness is removed from the game. The LONG RANGE COMBAT round is skipped for the opposing Team but not for Dr. Jack Franklin. Agents must use their MEDICAL skill as their value in CLOSE RANGE COMBAT. If an Agent has no MEDICAL skill, their value is 1.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "I hope those instruments were properly sterilized." - Dr. Jack Franklin

property.name: Text
property.value: Adds 3 to one Team's SCIENCES or adds 2 to one Team's COMPUTER skill check, or play this card to heal any one Agent damaged by the effects of "El Chupacabra".

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: Dr. Steen: "What you're looking at, Agent Scully, is the most ubiquitous fungal spore known to mankind - dermatophytosis."Scully: "Athlete's foot?"

property.name: Text
property.value: Adds 1 to one Team's COMPUTER skill check once per turn.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: Scully: "This compound...has Jason actually tested it yet?"Dr. Lisa Ianelli: "He hasn't tested it yet because it doesn't exist, except in the computer. So far the work's been limited to generating virtual chemicals."

property.name: Text
property.value: Adds 2 to one Team's MEDICAL or adds 1 to one Team's COMPUTER skill check.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: Mulder: "There were five deaths?"Dr. Shannon: "Yes. Four patients. The fifth was a colleague of ours who, for all intents and purposes, worked himself to death. He died of a drug overdose."

property.name: Text
property.value: Place three tokens on this card. Discard a token to add 2 to one Team's SCIENCES skill check. You may discard a token once per turn. Discard this Resource when all tokens have been Resource.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: Dr. Vitagliano: "There's some cellular material within the matrix."Scully: "Plant or animal?"Vitagliano: "I don't know. It's what I'd have to classify as a chimera. A hybrid cell."

property.name: Text
property.value: Play on an Agent in the section of the table designated The Gulag to immediately remove one token of imprisonment.

card.name: Ed Jerse and His Talking Tattoo

property.name: Text
property.value: The LONG RANGE COMBAT round is skipped. Any Agent wounded by this Adversary is afflicted with the Keyword INSANITY. This effect remains in place until all damage tokens are removed.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "It's more than just some chemical reaction. She talks to me. She hates women...my wife, my boss...you. She's so jealous, Dana. She makes me do things. I don't want to, but she controls me." - Ed Jerse

property.name: Text
property.value: Place five tokens on any Agent damaged by El Chupacabra's attack. Discard a token in each of the afflicted Agent's Briefing Phases. When the last token is removed, the Agent is removed from the game. This effect can only be negated by the remaining Team making a SCIENCES 3+ skill check or by playing a HEALING card prior to the Agent being removed.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "No. No soy un hombre! SOY EL CHUPACABRA!" - Eladio Buente

property.name: Text
property.value: Play this card to increase the applicable HEALTH of any Keyword EVOLUTIONARY or PRIMORDIAL Adversaries played at this Site by 2.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "I'm your mother and it's a mother's duty to provide." - Elaine Tanner

property.name: Text
property.value: Play this card immediately after discarding an OCCULT Adversary as a result of either Combat or a Negate effect. The Adversary is returned to the Field at no cost and may attack the Team again.

property.name: Text
property.value: Agents equipped with an Epoxy Vat have access to the Field Office Crime Lab. Adds 1 to the Agent's MEDICAL and SCIENCES skills.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "This procedure is called biopolymerization. It's basically a high - tech mummification process." - Scully

property.name: Text
property.value: Play this card to prevent any Adversaries that initiate combat from being negated at this Site. Combat must take place and is resolved normally.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: Mulder: "Kill me. Let them go."Alien Bounty Hunter: "You'd trade your life for his?"Mulder: "For my mother's."

property.name: Text
property.value: Select one Adversary card from your Discard Pile and add it to your hand.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "Will the real Leonard Betts please stand up?" - Mulder

property.name: Text
property.value: Play on an Agent in the section of the table designated The Gulag. Place an additional token of imprisonment on the Agent. The Agent must remain in The Gulag until all tokens are removed.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: Mulder: "Why are you here?"Prisoner: "To do the work. Like the others. Like them, I will die in an experiment when there is no longer any use for me."Mulder: "What kind of experiment?"

property.name: Text
property.value: Play on any one Agent in the Field or Hospital. An Agent with the Keyword BELIEVER immediately heals two tokens of damage. All other Agents immediately heal one token of damage. If played on either Scully or Mulder, treat Scully as a Keyword BELIEVER and treat Mulder as a Keyword SKEPTIC.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "Faith can make you stronger." - Father McCue

card.name: Flight 549 Crash Site, Upstate New York

property.name: Question
property.value: You may ask one MOTIVE question or one RESULT question.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "What we know right now is that the plane designated as Flight 549 lost radio contact tonight at 19:00 hours E.D.T. and subsequently crashed into a wooded area approximately thirty miles from Albany, New York." - Mike Millar, NTSB

property.name: Text
property.value: Take any two Keyword EVIDENCE or WITNESS cards from your discard pile. Add one card to your hand and play the other card immediately at no cost.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "You called for a forensic excavation at five A.M. on a Sunday? What are you looking for?" - Scully

property.name: Text
property.value: This card does not initiate Combat. Select one opposing Agent for abduction. Place this card on top of the Agent along with five tokens. Remove a token in each of the Agent's Briefing Phases. When the last token is discarded, the Agent is removed from the game. This effect can only be negated by the remaining Agents making an EVIDENCE COLLECTION 4+ skill check prior to the Agent being removed.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "She's safe...from the howlers. She's all right now." - Gerry Schnauz

card.name: Gerry Schnauz's RV, Traverse City, MI

property.name: Question
property.value: You may ask one RESULT question.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: Scully: "Why did your sister kill herself, Gerry? What did your father do to her?"Gerry Schnauz: "He didn't do anything. It was the howlers."

property.name: Text
property.value: Attach this card to one of your Agents. While this card is in play, your opponent must play with all Keyword OCCULT cards in their hand face-up on the table. This card is free if played on an Agent with the Keyword CANCER. Discard this card if your Agent's HEALTH is reduced to zero.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "No…no…I just want to be left alone!" - Harold Spuller

property.name: Text
property.value: Play this card to change the Site Prerequisite from MEDICAL to CRIMINAL INVESTIGATION. If your opponent fails this Site skill check, add 5 [CP] to your pool.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "I use a method of therapy that simulates an electrical impulse in the brain, using light and sound." - Dr. Charles Goldstein

property.name: Text
property.value: Once this card is played, the opposing Team may not use or apply skill values from any Keyword ELECTRICAL Equipment while investigating this Site.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: Mulder: "Unfortunately, you can't see very much on these. What...what's all this stuff here?"Security Guard: "Bad video. The security system isn't exactly state - of - the - art."

property.name: Question
property.value: You may ask one AFFILIATION question or one METHOD question. If you ask if the METHOD is "Possession", the skill check prerequisite is 4+.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "There's magic going on here, Mulder, only it's being done with silicone, collagen, and a well - placed scalpel." - Scully

property.name: Text
property.value: Play in conjunction with any GOVERNMENT Adversary. If an Agent's HEALTH is reduced to zero, place the Agent in a section of the table designated The Gulag and discard any Equipment. The Agent remains imprisoned for three full turns or until a Keyword ESCAPE card is played on them. Place three tokens on the Agent and remove one during each of the Agent's Briefing Phases. When the last token is removed, move the Agent to the Bureau (undamaged).

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "I want to see his supervisor." - Krycek

property.name: Text
property.value: Place this card beneath an Agent to move them to a section of the table designated The Gulag. Place three tokens on the Agent (two tokens if played on Alex Krycek). Remove one token during each of your opponent's Debriefing Phases. While in play, the Agent may not move or contribute to any skill checks. All Equipment attached to the imprisoned Agent is discarded immediately. Discard this card when the last token is removed and move the Agent to the Bureau.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: Mulder: "How many men have died here?"Prisoner: "Hundreds, maybe more."

property.name: Text
property.value: Play on one Agent during the Briefing Phase to double the Agent's RES for one turn. In addition, you may requisition one Equipment card to the Agent at no cost. Each player may only have one of this card in their decks.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: Scully: "Mulder, you have never remembered my birthday in the four years I've known you."Mulder: "That's the way I like to celebrate them. It's every four years, it's like dog years that way."

property.name: Text
property.value: Place three tokens on this card. Remove a token and pick a number between 0 and 12. Your opponent must show you all cards in their hand that cost the same as the chosen number. Discard this card when all tokens have been removed.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "I don't know anything. I didn't do anything. Leave me alone." - Harold Spuller

property.name: Text
property.value: Attach this card to an Agent in the Hospital and place two tokens on it. Discard a token to either heal one point of damage or to remove a game effect token from the Agent. Discard the Hospital Gown when all tokens have been removed.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "Mom, I'm fine. I'm going to be fine, I'm just here for treatment." - Scully

property.name: Question
property.value: You may ask one METHOD question.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: Mulder: "I just spoke with the bellman who brought up the luggage."Scully: "What did he say?"Mulder: "The iceman cometh."

property.name: Text
property.value: Flip a coin in the air. If the coin lands on heads, your opponent must discard the following cards from their hand: "No One So Paranoid", "The Lone Gunmen", "Langly", "Frohike", "Byers", and "Call On Us More Often". The listed cards may not be used to negate this card.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "I can kill you whenever I please…but not today." - The Cigarette - Smoking Man

property.name: Text
property.value: Place this card on an opposing Agent in the Field to change one Keyword LAW or INDEPENDENT to INSANITY. This card is removed when a Healing card is played on the afflicted Agent.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "Ergot is a parasite that lives off of rye and related grasses. Svo said that he used rye somehow in his ink. Now if this is true, we may be subject to hallucinogenic ergotism. Aural, visual hallucinations. Dangerous and unlikely behavior." - Scully

property.name: Text
property.value: Adds 1 to one Team's CRIMINAL INVESTIGATION or EVIDENCE COLLECTION skill check, or play this card to force your opponent to randomly shuffle one card from their hand back into their Bureau Deck.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "United States Postal Inspector. My office is investigating a mail theft - one which we've traced to your missing person, Ms. Mary Louise LeFante." - Inspector Puett

property.name: Text
property.value: Play on an Agent in the section of the table designated The Gulag. The imprisoned Agent is immediately moved to the Bureau (undamaged).

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "Back on your horses! We must find him!" - Gulag Commandant, in Russian

property.name: Text
property.value: Play to change a Site Prerequisite to BEHAVIORAL 3+.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: Jason Ludwig: "Trepkos is what happened here."Mulder: "Did he kill Erikson?"Ludwig: "He flipped out. Right after the descent, he just flipped out.

property.name: Text
property.value: Unless this card is negated, your opponent may not negate any cards that would send an Agent to The Gulag section of the table (or cards affecting Agents in The Gulag) while this Site is being investigated.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: Krycek: "What are they doing?"Mulder: "Looks like some kind of mining camp…Oh! I don't think they're miners."

property.name: Text
property.value: Place three tokens on this card. Discard a token to add 2 to one Team's OCCULT INVESTIGATION skill check. You may discard a token once per turn. Discard this Resource when all tokens have been removed.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "Early Kabbalists, they believed that a righteous man could actually create a living being from the Earth itself. Fashioned from mud or clay. This creature could only be brought to life by the power of the word." - Kenneth Ungar

property.name: Text
property.value: Play this card to remove the Keyword CANCER from an afflicted Agent. You may have up to five Kurt Crawford cards in your deck.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: Mulder: "These women, these women are your birth mothers."Kurt Crawford: "Barren now, from the same procedure that caused their cancer. And now they're left to die, their conditions hastened by the men running this project."

property.name: Text
property.value: Play this card to increase the cost of all Witnesses played at this Site by 2 [RP].

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: Attorney: "He will not answer any questions regarding his guilt or innocence."Detective Hudak: "I'd be real happy if you'd quit talking right now."

property.name: Text
property.value: This card is free if played on a Keyword CANCER card and Activator requirements are ignored. Leonard Betts regenerates 1 point of HEALTH for each Witness discarded from your hand.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "I'm sorry…but you've got something I need." - Leonard Betts

property.name: Question
property.value: You may ask one METHOD question.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: Scully: "Why are we here, Mulder?"Mulder: "Pendrell found asbestos fibers on Owen Sanders' body. And you remove asbestos from an old building before you tear it down. It had to come from somewhere."

property.name: Question
property.value: You may ask one METHOD question.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "You guys ever been to the Lombard Research Facility? Well, pick out something black and sexy and prepare to do some funky poaching." - Mulder, to the Lone Gunmen

property.name: Text
property.value: Adds 1 to one Team's ALIEN INVESTIGATION skill check once during your turn. While in play, you may Discard this Resource during your opponent's turn to play the "Alien Bounty Hunter" at no cost, Activator requirements permitting.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "A man came. He...he sealed most of the men below decks without any air and...and then he started to execute the rest of us. Every…they're all dead." - Lt. Terry Wilmer

property.name: Text
property.value: For the remainder of this turn, your opponent may only play Keyword GOVERNMENT cards.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: Mulder: "Are you saying that our government wants these officers dead?...Why would they ask us to protect them?"Marita Covarrubias: "Because they know you can't."

property.name: Text
property.value: Negate any one Keyword ALIEN or Keyword ALIEN INVESTIGATION card.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: The Cigarette - Smoking Man: "A living E.B.E. could advance Bill Mulder's project by decades."Deep Throat: "Security Resolution Council 1013 states, 'Any country capturing such an entity is responsible for its immediate extermination'."

property.name: Text
property.value: Adds 2 to onr Team's BUREAUCRACY or adds 1 to one Team's COMPUTER skill check, or play this card to return "Samuel Aboah" to the bottom of the owning player's Bureau Deck.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: Marcus Duff: "I assist people from that part of the world where I came from fifteen years ago."Mulder: " Well, we're looking for somebody that came a little more recently than that. On a flight from Burkina Faso?"

property.name: Game Effect
property.value: Marita's ALIEN INVESTIGATION and SUBTERFUGE skills are increased by one if she and Agent Alex Krycek are on the same Team, and her BUREAUCRACY is reduced by one.

property.name: Bio
property.value: While employed as an assistant to one of the Special Representatives of UN Secretary General, Marita Covarrubias covertly provided Agent Fox Mulder with classified information. Unbeknownst to Mulder, Marita was an intelligence operative for the Cigarette - Smoking Man.

property.name: Text
property.value: Adds 2 to one Team's BEHAVIORAL or BUREAUCRACY skill check. While this card is in play, the Witness card "Harold Spuller" may be played for free.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: Mulder: "Has he ever been a problem?"Martin Alpert: "Harold? No. He has a tendency to get a little worked up."Mulder: "Do you think I could talk to him?"Alpert: "Yeah, sure."

property.name: Text
property.value: Adds 1 to one Team's ALIEN INVESTIGATION or OBSERVATION skill check. Alternately, play this card when one of your Agents is the target of "Brother Martin is Attracted to You". Discard Michel to negate the Adversary.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "I saw her in her clothes and she looked like...she looked like a man." - Michel

property.name: Text
property.value: Adds 1 to one Team's MEDICAL skill check once per turn. If your opponent plays an EVOLUTIONARY Adversary while this card is in play, Michelle Wilkes is negated and removed from the game.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "You know how they say some people can just look at you and tell you what's wrong? Leonard could do that." - Michelle Wilkes

property.name: Text
property.value: Play to force the Investigating player to discard all Keyword ALIEN INVESTIGATION and OBSERVATION cards in their hand. In addition, any and all Witnesses played at this Site are immediately afflicted with the Keyword ABDUCTEE (due to residual radiation) even after this card is resolved.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "You're saying the man sitting in seat 13 - F was abducted mid - flight without any depressurization of the cabin, without any effect on the plane." - Mike Millar, NTSB

card.name: Migrant Workers Camp, San Joaquin, CA

property.name: Question
property.value: You may ask one MOTIVE question.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: Mulder: "Fortean events have been linked to alien encounters, cattle mutilations,the kind of exsanguinated animal carcass you were just looking at."Scully: "And the victim, Maria Dorantes, did she die in a similar fashion?"

property.name: Game Effect
property.value: Treat Mike Millar as a RES 2 if he is in the Field. If Millar is in the same Team as Agent Mulder and/or Agent Scully, he gains +1 to his ALIEN INVESTIGATION and OBSERVATION skills.

property.name: Bio
property.value: Mike Millar is a member of the National Transportation Safety Board who oversaw the investigation of the fatal crash of Flight 549. He disagreed with Agent Mulder's theory that aliens were involved in the downing of the plane.

property.name: Text
property.value: Adds 1 [RP] to your Pool every time a Keyword BUREAUCRACY or SUBTERFUGE card is played.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: Mulder: "Thank you for seeing me at such a late hour, sir."Diabria: "I did not have much of a choice in this matter. Someone from the United Nations spoke to the ambassador directly. What's so important that it can't wait?"Mulder: "With all due respect, sir, I think you already know."

property.name: Text
property.value: Attach this card to Assistant Director Skinner. Adds 1 to Skinner's EVIDENCE COLLECTION skill once per turn. Discard this card when Skinner's HEALTH is reduced to zero.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: Misty Nagata: "I can look up the tracking number."Skinner: "That would be a big help to me, Misty. And maybe to Jane."

property.name: Question
property.value: You may ask one MOTIVE question or one METHOD question. If you ask if the MOTIVE is "Survival", the skill check prerequisite is 4+.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "It should probably be noted that when Mr. Betts arrived here last night he was sans head. He was decapitated when his ambulance crashed." - Mulder

property.name: Text
property.value: Attach this card to either an Agent in the Bureau section or one that is investigating a Site. The Agent is afflicted with the Keyword TRAITOR and may only contribute to SUBTERFUGE and Combat skill checks until this card is removed. Discard this card when an Agent is part of a Team that successfully investigates a Site. This card is free if played on a Keyword NEUTRAL Agent.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: Skinner: "What did you have me cover up?"The Cigarette - Smoking Man: "I think the less you know the better, under the circumstances."

property.name: Text
property.value: Place this card on an opposing Agent afflicted with the Keyword CANCER. The Agent is immediately moved to the Hospital (if not already there) and must remain in the Hospital until the Keyword CANCER is removed.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "What I couldn't tell Agent Mulder, what I had only learned myself, was that the cancer which had been diagnosed in me several months earlier had metastasized..." - Scully

property.name: Text
property.value: Force your opponent to discard one Witness RESOURCE in play. In addition, PRIMORDIAL Adversaries may ignore Activator requirements to attack Agents at this Site.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "I can tell you don't have no children. Maybe one day you'll learn... the pride...the love...when you know your boy will do anything for his mother." - Mrs. Peacock

property.name: Text
property.value: Only Agents with OBSERVATION as a skill may apply their LRC and CRC skills in Combat. This Adversary may use SUBTERFUGE cards at no cost.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "I think that Teager has an ability...the ability to effectively erase himself from the visual field." - Mulder

property.name: Text
property.value: Play on any ALIEN or GOVERNMENT Adversary to negate all damage allocated to that Adversary this round. This card may be played to negate the effects of "Alien Stiletto."

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: Scully: "Mulder, he's coming after you."Mulder: "Who?"Scully: "The man you left for dead. He's alive!"

property.name: Text
property.value: Discard one Witness card from your hand to apply a -2 modifier to one Team's OCCULT INVESTIGATION or MEDICAL skill check.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "I think this patient is finished." - Doctor Lloyd

property.name: Text
property.value: Play this card to prevent all Agents with the Keyword FBI from contributing to any skill checks occurring at this Site.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: Denny Markham: "I'm not going anywhere."Scully: "Sir, we have a warrant for your arrest if you don't cooperate."

property.name: Text
property.value: Any Adversaries played at this Site are shuffled back into your Bureau Deck instead of the Discard Pile.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: Scully: "Well, sir, they, um, they have a way of being almost invisible."Mulder: "The truth is…nobody cares."

property.name: Text
property.value: Play this card on a Team in the Field that plays a Witness. Discard the Witness and skip the LONG RANGE COMBAT round. For the first round of CLOSE RANGE COMBAT, the chosen Agent is the only one who may participate in the Combat.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "Take your poison, Harold. Go on. What do you got to live for now, huh?" - Nurse Innes

property.name: Text
property.value: Adds 3 to one Team's MEDICAL or adds 2 to one Team's OCCULT INVESTIGATION skill check. If your opponent plays an OCCULT Adversary while this card is in play, Nurse Waite is negated and removed from the game.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "I helped prep the patient. I was supposed to assist. I did my job as a nurse." - Nurse Rebecca Waite

property.name: Text
property.value: Adds 1 to your [RP] Pool every time a Keyword CRIMINAL INVESTIGATION or PRIMORDIAL card is played.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "We've got the State Police looking as far south as Grand Rapids. Still no sign of him." - Officer Corning

property.name: Text
property.value: Negates the effects of any one Witness that modifies a LONG RANGE COMBAT or CLOSE RANGE COMBAT skill check. The Witness is discarded prior to dealing damage in the Combat round. This card is free if played on an Adversary that is capable of using SUBTERFUGE Combat cards.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "This wound's in the wrong place. He was shot in the throat. He wasn't trying to save this victim." - Mulder

property.name: Question
property.value: You may ask one MOTIVE question.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "Go back to the refinery. See if you can find anybody who knows anything about that truck." - Mulder

property.name: Text
property.value: If this Adversary is played on a Keyword SCIENCES Witness, the Witness is negated and removed from the game. The Long Range Combat round is skipped. Any Agent wounded by Nichols is instantly frozen and may not move, contribute their skills and effects, add to the Pools, or heal wounds until a HEALING card is played on the Agent.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "I came here to kill you." - Old Man Nichols

property.name: Question
property.value: You may ask one AFFILIATION question or one METHOD question.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: Marita Covarrubias: "Seven packages that were sent from Canada to a P.O. Box in Payson, South Carolina. I came here to find out what was in those packages."Skinner: "You're a little late to do anything about it."

property.name: Question
property.value: You may ask one MOTIVE question.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "The Peacocks built that farm during the Civil War. It still has no electricity, no running water, no heat. They grow their own food, they raise their own pigs, the breed their own cows...raise and breed their own stock...if you get my meaning." - Sheriff Andy Taylor

property.name: Text
property.value: If the Team makes a MEDICAL 4+ skill check, add five tokens to the [RP] Pool.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: Mulder: "I heard you were down here slicing and dicing. Who's the lucky stiff?"Scully: "His name was Owen Sanders. He was reported as the fourth kidnap victim in Philadelphia until his body turned up last night looking like this."

property.name: Text
property.value: Place this card on top of an opponent's Site and place two tokens on it. Remove a token during each of their following Briefing Phases. While this card is in play, the Site cannot be resolved. The Team may not move or contribute their skills until the last token is removed, except for Agents equipped with a "Biohazard Suit".

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "Get on your cell phone and have a hazmat team assembled." - Mulder

property.name: Text
property.value: Attach this card to an Agent with the Keyword NEUTRAL or a SUBTERFUGE skill of 1+. As long as the Agent in the Field, their SUBTERFUGE skill value is increased by 1 for each point of damage affecting them.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: Krycek: "I am only here, Comrade, to congratulate you on a fine job."Vassily Peskow: Thank you."(Translated from Russian)

property.name: Text
property.value: Play this card during the Investigation Phase. Make an OBSERVATION 4+ skill check to search through your Bureau Deck and draw one Keyword WEAPON or ARMOR Equipment card. Attach the Equipment to an Agent at half-cost (rounded up), ignoring Activator requirements.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: Scully: "Are these vests absolutely necessary, deputy?"Deputy Barney Paster: "I've seen them fire muskets before. I, for one, am not getting taken out by some antique."

property.name: Text
property.value: Play immediately after discarding an EVOLUTIONARY Adversary as a result of either Combat or a Negate effect. The Adverary is returned to the Field at no cost and may attack the Team again.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: Mulder: "What if this man's life force, his Chi, whatever you want to call it, somehow retained a blueprint of the actual man himself? Guiding rapid growth not as cancer, but as regeneration?"Scully: "You think that Leonard Betts regrew his head?"

property.name: Text
property.value: Force an opponent Team to make a SUBTERFUGE 4+ skill check. If they fail, apply a -2 modifier to the Site skill check and negate all prior Witnesses that are modifying the Team's skill check.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "You're not giving me very much choice. I really don't want to go back to prison." - John Lee Roche

property.name: Text
property.value: If an Agent's HEALTH is reduced to zero by this Adversary, place the Agent in a section of the table designated The Gulag and discard any Equipment. The Agent remains imprisoned for three full turns or until a Keyword ESCAPE card is played on them. Place three tokens on the Agent and remove one during each of the Agent's Briefing Phases. When the last token is removed, move the Agent to the Bureau (undamaged).

property.name: Text
property.value: Adds 1 to the Agent's LRC and CRC skills. Additionally, place 3 tokens on this card. Remove a token to prevent one point of damage. Discard the Tactical Gear when all tokens have been removed. Excess damage is applied to the Agent as normal. This card cannot be sold for [CP].

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "Federal agent! I'm armed! Exit the vehicle, now!" - Mulder

card.name: Saint Elias Mountains, Yukon Territory, Canada

property.name: Question
property.value: You may ask one MOTIVE question or one METHOD question.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "The area where it was found is in the terminal moraine of a glacier that has since receded. 200 years ago, the area where he was frozen was within the tree line, so there would have been a thaw." - Dr. Arlinsky

property.name: Text
property.value: Adds 1 [RP] to your Pool each time a Keyword ALIEN or ALIEN INVESTIGATION card is played.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: Jeremiah Smith: "She's a drone, Mister Mulder. A worker."Mulder: "What are you talking about?

property.name: Text
property.value: The LONG RANGE COMBAT round is skipped. One opposing Agent (your choice) is considered paralyzed and may not move or contribute to the Combat. The target Agent is still vulnerable to Aboah's attack. This Adversary may use SUBTERFUGE cards.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: Scully: "He can't have gotten far."Mulder: "This guy can squeeze into a coffee can, Scully. He could be anywhere."

property.name: Text
property.value: This Adversary can attack one Agent (your choice) and is then discarded. If Agent Pendrell is in the Investigating Team, then he takes the LRC damage instead of the selected Agent. Agents attacked by this Adversary must immediately discard all attached Keyword ALIEN Equipment.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "A man, if he's any man at all, knows he must be ready to sacrifice himself to that which is greater than he." - Scott Garrett

property.name: Text
property.value: This card is free if the Site prerequisite is ALIEN INVESTIGATION. Any Witnesses contributing to the Site skill check are immediately discarded. This Adversary may use MARTIAL ARTS and SUBTERFUGE cards.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: Scott Ostelhoff: "Is he a believer?"Babcock: "Oh, yeah."Ostelhoff: "Then we're the only ones who know."

property.name: Text
property.value: Play this card to examine your opponent's hand. Your opponent must discard two cards from their hand (your choice).

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "Elaine Tanner? We have a warrant to search the premises." - Scully

property.name: Text
property.value: Force one Agent with the Keyword FBI (your choice, but excluding Fox Mulder and Alex Krycek), back to the Bureau immediately. The Agent may not leave the Bureau, requisition Equipment, or contribute their skills until either the controlling player pays 7 [RP] or reveals all the cards in their hand.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "Either you tell us what you know about Agent Mulder's whereabouts, or you will be held in Contempt of Congress." - Senator Sorenson

property.name: Text
property.value: Discard one Witness card from your hand to apply a -2 modifier to one Team's ALIEN INVESTIGATION or SCIENCES skill check.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "Well, now...don't you all take the cake? Does your mom ever mix you up?" - Repairman

property.name: Text
property.value: Adds 2 to one Team's ALIEN INVESTIGATION or SUBTERFUGE skill check.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "I'm telling you what I saw. That we shot down a civilian jet, knowingly and willingly." - Sgt. Louis Frisch

property.name: Text
property.value: Adds 1 to one Team's OBSERVATION skill check once per turn. When one of your Agents is the target of an abduction, Sharon Graffia is abducted instead. Discard this card and the abduction is negated.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "My brother, who I believe you know, he said you'd understand what to do." - Sharon Graffia

property.name: Text
property.value: Play to change the Site Prerequisite from EVIDENCE COLLECTION to MEDICAL.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: Agent Pendrell: "Shouldn't we wait for Agent Scully? Just so I won't have to repeat myself."Mulder: "She's not coming."Pendrell: "Why not?"Mulder: "She had a date…Breathe, Agent Mulder. It's with a dead man. She's doing an autopsy."

property.name: Text
property.value: Attach this Witness to a Team. Sheriff Taylor will add his skills to the appropriate skill check like an Agent, CI:1, CRC:1, LRC:2, and HEALTH:3. If his HEALTH is reduced to zero, or at any time there are no Agents in the Team, Taylor is removed from the game.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "Now, I want to find whoever did this...but in doing so, I'd like it if the way things are around here didn't have to change." - Sheriff Andy Taylor

property.name: Text
property.value: Adds 3 to one Team's CRIMINAL INVESTIGATION or adds 2 to one Team's BEHAVIORAL skill check.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "It's just been my experience that many people have a harder time accepting these people's deformities than they do themselves." - Sheriff Hamilton

property.name: Text
property.value: Adds 1 to one Team's CRIMINAL INVESTIGATION skill check once per turn.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "I think that Darlene has a very active imagination. I've been listening to those stories since the first grade." - Sheriff Withers

property.name: Text
property.value: Adds 1 to the Agent's CLOSE RANGE COMBAT skill. Discard this card to escape The Gulag and return to the Bureau (undamaged).

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: Mulder: "Where did you get this?"Prisoner: "I made it, to kill myself. It took me two weeks… but by then I had lost the desire."

property.name: Text
property.value: Play to force the Investigating player to discard all Keyword COMPUTER and EVIDENCE COLLECTION cards in their hand. In addition, if Skinner is part of the Team investigating this Site, his SUBTERFUGE skill is permanently reduced by one. Place this card beneath Skinner as a reminder of his reduced skill.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: Officer Robbins: "Your name?"Skinner: "Special Agent Fox Mulder."Robbins: "Working the night shift, Agent Mulder?"Skinner: "Yeah. Somebody's got to."

property.name: Text
property.value: Place this card beneath an opposing Agent (your choice) and place two tokens on the Agent. Remove a token during each of your opponent's Debriefing Phases. While in play, the Agent's skills (except HEALTH) become -1 and all Equipment is discarded. During your opponent's turn, you may deploy the Agent as desired and contribute (negatively) to an Investigating Team's skill checks. Discard this card when the last token is removed.

property.name: Text
property.value: Subtract 4 from one Team's OCCULT INVESTIGATION or SCIENCES skill check.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "You killed Maria! Because she wouldn't love you! Because her heart belongs to only one man! Don't make me shoot you in the back, Eladio! Turn! See my tears! Turn around like a man!" - Soledad Buente

property.name: Text
property.value: Attach this card to an Agent in the Field. You may place any Witnesses that modify skill checks under this card. No more than three cards may be under this card at any one time. Once per turn, you may play cards stored under this card for 1[RP] less. Discard this Resource and the cards under it when the card is negated or when the Agent's HEALTH is reduced to zero.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "We have come together in this life, this time. Only to meet in passing. It is soheartbreaking to wait." - Melissa Riedal-Ephesian/Sarah Kavanaugh

property.name: Text
property.value: Play this card when a Keyword HEALING Card is played on an opposing Agent. The Agent is instantly killed and removed from the game.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: Lisa Ianelli: "Something's wrong?"Mulder: "Scully, look at his temperature."Scully: "Oh, my God. He's on fire. He's having febrile seizures."Doctor: This can't be right. He's burning up. Hold him down!"

property.name: Text
property.value: Play after negating an Adversary when no Combat was involved. If the Team makes a CRIMINAL INVESTIGATION 4+ skill check, place this card in your Bureau Section. You may discard this card during your Investigation Phase to add 2 to a Site skill check.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "Okay, Gerry. All in here, your wallet, jewelry, everything." - Officer Trout, while processing Gerry Schnauz

property.name: Question
property.value: You may ask one METHOD question or one RESULT question. If you ask if the RESULT is "Insanity", the skill check prerequisite is 4+.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: Ed Jerse: "You did good work. It's very nice. It's just like in the window, but…"Svo: "So what? Why do you want to cover it? Listen, friend, everyone gets tattoo they deserve."

property.name: Text
property.value: Play on a Team investigating a Site with OCCULT INVESTIGATION skill as a prerequisite. As long as the Team can make an OCCULT INVESTIGATION skill check of 5+, no OCCULT Adversaries may be played on the Agents at this Site.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "A pentagram is supposed to be a symbol of protection and positive power used to control the elemental forces." - Mulder

property.name: Question
property.value: You may ask one METHOD question or one RESULT question.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: Mulder: "Children born with vestigial tails don't interest you?"Scully: "Caudal appendages. Fetuses have them. Their coccyx enlargens to contain the spinal fluid and then it shrinks as the child develops. Occasionally, it doesn't."

card.name: Temple of the Seven Stars, Apison, TN

property.name: Question
property.value: You may ask one MOTIVE question or one RESULT question.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "Ephesian had six women on the verge of suicide. You witnessed it. My concern is if the temple members are released, any subsequent federal investigation will ignite Ephesian's paranoia to such a degree that we won't have another Waco on our hands... we'll have Jonestown." - Skinner

property.name: Text
property.value: Play after your opponent has identified your X-File's METHOD. While this card is in play, you (as the Directed Player) may play Keyword GOVERNMENT cards for free and your GOVERNMENT Adversaries may ignore activator requirements.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "As a friend, I should advise you, Mr. Skinner, that withholding information on matters of national security is punishable under the laws of this country for treason and sedition." - The Cigarette - Smoking Man

property.name: Text
property.value: Play to add 4 [CP] to your pool immediately.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "There is suspicion of an accomplice, based on the one piece of evidence found at the crime scene, a so - called "death card" used by soldiers in Vietnam to mark their kills…" - Assistant Director Walter Skinner

property.name: Text
property.value: Play this card after one of your Teams successfully investigates a Site with OBSERVATION skill as a prerequisite. Place this card in your Bureau. Discard this Resource to add 1 to an OBSERVATION skill check.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "At times, I almost dream. I, too, have spent a life the sages' way and tread once more familiar paths." - Mulder, quoting "Paracelsus" by Robert Browning

property.name: Text
property.value: The Golem is unaffected by Combat attacks. This Adversary will attack for two CLOSE RANGE COMBAT rounds and is then discarded.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: Mulder: "So the Golem is an imperfect creation."Kenneth Ungar: "Kind of a monster, really. Unable to speak or feel anything but the most primitive of emotions. It runs amok. It has to be destroyed by its creator."

property.name: Text
property.value: Any Witness RESOURCE cards in play are immediately discarded. The Grey-Haired Man may use MARTIAL ARTS and SUBTERFUGE cards. Damage caused by this Adversary during LONG RANGE COMBAT may be split among all opponents (Directed Player's choice).

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: Frohike: "The doors work on redundant systems. We're working fast."Mulder: "Work faster!"

property.name: Text
property.value: Play this card on a Team in the Field that plays a Witness. The Mad Hatter abducts the Witness and the Team must make a CRIMINAL INVESTIGATION 5+ skill check. If unsuccessful, the Site skill check is failed and the Witness is removed from the game. If the Team makes the skill check, this card is negated and removed from the game.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "You bring my hearts and give them back to me…I'll tell you everything you want to know." - John Lee Roche

property.name: Text
property.value: Play this card on a Team with Fox Mulder to search through your Bureau Deck and add one of the following cards to your hand: "Bill Mulder", "Mrs. Mulder", "Samantha Mulder", or "Samantha, Agrarian Clone". If you play the chosen card immediately, then you may do so for half cost (rounded up).

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: Bill Mulder: "My one - year old just said his first word."Young Cigarette - Smoking Man: "What was the word?"Bill Mulder: "J.F.K."

property.name: Text
property.value: Adds 1 to one Team's OBSERVATION or SUBTERFUGE skill check, or play this card to negate the Bluff "You've Got a Tail".

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: Fred Nieman: "Is it okay for us to get into our bathroom now?"Mulder: "Excuse me, sir?"Nieman: "Well, I was hoping we could get into our bathroom sometime this evening. You said the police were going to come by and dust it for some fingerprints but that was over four hours ago."

property.name: Text
property.value: Apply -1 to any Equipment cards attached to the Team that modify LONG RANGE COMBAT or CLOSE RANGE COMBAT. Damage caused by this Adversary may be split among all opponents (Directed Player's choice).

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "That farm belongs to the Peacock family. Three boys now - well, men. Guess you could call them human." - Sheriff Andy Taylor

property.name: Text
property.value: Attach this card to a Witness RESOURCE. If at any time the Witness is negated or removed from the game, your opponent loses 5 [CP] and must discard all GOVERNMENT Adversaries in their deck.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: The Well - Manicured Man: "This was a professional hit."The Cigarette - Smoking Man: "Were you sleeping with her? Surely you wouldn't be so foolish as to put the project at risk for the sake of your personal pleasures."The Well - Manicured Man: "Find her killer!"

property.name: Text
property.value: Adds 1 to the Agent's EVIDENCE COLLECTION skill.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "That's a passport photo from a local drugstore. The druggist who took that photo is the last known person to have seen Mary LeFante. Only he claims that wasn't the photo he was taking." - Mulder

property.name: Text
property.value: Play this card on a Site any time after your opponent has assigned Agents to the Site. Unless this card is negated, only Agents with an OBSERVATION skill of 1+ may contribute their skills to any checks occurring at this Site.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: Mulder: "I thought you said there was someone meeting us."Dr. Arlinsky: "Yeah, a guide named Rolston."

property.name: Text
property.value: This card does not initiate Combat. Choose one Agent on the opposing Team. Your opponent must flip over and discard the top card from their Bureau deck. If the card has a [CP] cost, the target Agent inflicts damage on another Agent equal to the cost of the card. If the card has a [RP] cost, the target Agent receives damage equal to the cost of the card. If the card has a [*P] cost, then no damage is applied and this card is discarded.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: Mulder: "Get away!"Scully: "Are you going to shoot me, Mulder? Is that how much this means to you?"

property.name: Text
property.value: Play this card to add 2X [CP] to your pool. X = the number of Witnesses in your Discard Pile.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: The First Elder: "Should we assume that the trial run is proceeding as planned?"The Cigarette - Smoking Man: "It's already begun."

property.name: Text
property.value: Show this card to your opponent to retrieve all Keyword RESOURCE cards from your Discard Pile. Shuffle them back into your Bureau Deck and discard this card.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: Mulder: "How'd you guys get in?"Byers: "A modified clipper chip we cannibalized from a government surplus army field encoder."Frohike: "Bought it back from the Chinese."

property.name: Question
property.value: You may ask one AFFILIATION question or one RESULT question.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "June 30, 1908. Tungus tribesmen and Russian fur traders look up into the southeastern Siberian sky and see a fireball streaking to Earth. When it hit the atmosphere, it created a series of cataclysmic explosions that are considered to be the largest single cosmic event in the history of civilization." - Mulder

card.name: U.F.O. Crash Site, Great Sacandaga Lake, NY

property.name: Question
property.value: You may ask one AFFILIATION question or one RESULT question.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: Mulder: "What if that's because there is no second crash site, because that second aircraft never fell to the ground? It came down somewhere around here."Scully: "In Great Sacandaga Lake?"

property.name: Text
property.value: The cost of any PRIMORDIAL or EVOLUTIONARY Adversaries played at this Site is reduced by 2 for each female Agent on the Team.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: Scully: "I'm seeing a whole new side of you, Mulder."Van Blundht/Mulder: "Is that a good thing?"Scully: "I like it."

property.name: Text
property.value: Vassily Peskow can attack one Agent (your choice) and is then discarded. If the target Agent has any Equipment cards that modify LRC or CRC, Peskow may steal that Equipment and use it in Combat. Discard the Equipment when combat is resolved. This Adversary may use MARTIAL ARTS and SUBTERFUGE cards.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "I would just as soon kill you, but please, don't make me. My work is done." - Vassily Peskow

property.name: Question
property.value: You may ask one MOTIVE question.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "I've got 4 miles of crowded streets where thirty - one military officers are staging for a parade into Freedom Square. If what you're saying has any truth to it, I can't protect these men." - Skinner

property.name: Text
property.value: Play this card on a Site card with COMPUTER or SCIENCES as a prerequisite. Immediately discard all Active and Conspiracy cards attached to the Site, along with the Site itself. The Case Assignment Phase starts over and the turn resumes as normal.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: Scully: "You're seriously suggesting that this old man is back from the future?"Mulder: "Unless you have a better explanation for how he knew exactly when and how Lucas Menand was gonna be killed."

property.name: Text
property.value: Force an opponent to remove one Keyword ARTIFACT card from the game.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: Mulder: "Where would you put this this rock if you didn't want it to be found?"Scully: "Back in the ground."

property.name: Text
property.value: Attach this card to a Keyword MULTI Site to choose which prerequisite your opponent's Team must meet for this Site.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "What is a death omen if not a vision of our own mortality? And who among us would most likely be able to see the dead?" - Mulder

property.name: Text
property.value: Play this card to negate one Keyword NEGATE card. If "X" is the negated card, it is removed from the game along with this card.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: Mulder: "I feel like I came so close."Scully: "I feel it too. I know it."Mulder: "How?"Scully: "I was warned by a man we both know, who I believe knows the truth, who can lead us to a place to start."
